puzzles.title: Checkmate in 2
puzzles.subtitle: Find the forcing sequence for White

solutionSequence.comment: Sacrifice the rook to open the king
Black must recapture with the f8 rook

hints: Sometimes you need to sacrifice material to deliver checkmate
puzzles.successMessage: Brilliant! You found the rook sacrifice leading to checkmate!
puzzles.failureMessage: Think about sacrificing material to expose the king.

puzzles.title: Checkmate in 3
puzzles.subtitle: Find the winning combination for White

solutionSequence.comment: Queen sacrifice to pull the queen away

hints: Look for a forcing sequence starting with a queen sacrifice
The black king is vulnerable on the back rank
puzzles.successMessage: Spectacular! You found the beautiful queen sacrifice combination!
puzzles.failureMessage: This is tricky - look for a forcing move that starts with a queen sacrifice.

hints: Look for a move that attacks two pieces at once
